abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.description: Summons a torrent that deals damage and launches enemy units into the air. The torrent takes 1.6 seconds to form and erupts for 1 second, at which point it deals damage and tosses enemy units into the air for 1.6 seconds.
abilities.notes: Provides vision at the target area. Has a delay before triggering.

abilities.name: Tidebringer
abilities.description: Kunkka's sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area in front of him for a single strike. The cleave damage is not reduced with distance.
abilities.notes: Cleave damage ignores armor value but not armor type. Can be manually cast.

abilities.name: X Marks the Spot
abilities.description: Kunkka targets an enemy or allied hero, marking their position with an X. After a delay, the marked hero will be called back to the X. Kunkka can trigger the return early by casting Return.
abilities.notes: Can target both enemies and allies. Return can be cast to recall the target early.

abilities.name: Ghostship
abilities.description: Summons a ghostly ship that sails through battle before crashing, damaging and stunning all enemies caught near the crash site. Allied heroes near the wreck are given a buff that provides bonus movement speed and delayed damage reduction.
abilities.notes: Allied heroes in the area gain Rum buff, which gives movement speed and stores 50% of damage to be taken later.
